## Material Description

The module provides step-by-step instructions and tools fort an empirical research-based experiment focused on data science approach to art history. The module allows to select any artist are art genre, and perform new experiments with new data.

## Module Materials

You can access the material [here](https://github.com/KansasData/Module/blob/main/kstate_shamir_arthistory/computer_art.pdf)
